name: Blackline Demo
description:
Blackline is an action driving game where the goal is simple: cause as much damage as possible before the time runs out.

After being kidnapped by a huge organisation, you are tasked with causing chaos around the globe so they can steal from the biggest banks undetected, failing to comply means the death of you and everyone you know.

In the Demo so far;

  • Collect 9 customisable cars.
  • Customise skins, body kits and upgrade the engine and handling.
  • Complete 5 missions in Toronto with various tasks.
  • Fight the boss of Toronto, leading the Welders' gang.

Game Features:

  • Highly destructible environments.
  • Damageable traffic and pedestrians.
  • Power ups (Rage, Time extension, Repair).
  • Remote triggers to blow up parts of the city.

    and much more!
